text: "Breathe" sometimes credited as "Breathe in the Air" is a 1973 song by Pink Floyd. It is the second track from their eighth studio album The Dark Side of the Moon. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Psychedelic rock songs Category:Pink Floyd songs Category:The Flaming Lips songs
title: Breathe (Pink Floyd song)
